name: PARKSHOOT
description:
You like shooting games, parkour and replay viewing, because you came to the Perfect place

Parkshot is a shooting and action game in which you have to collect the diamond to move to the next level.

In the game you have the option to play the whole game in slow motion so that you can admire the explosions created by the flammable barrels shot, because we also have two types of weapons with which to do this:

PT09 which is a full car and a

GS1 which is a simple pistol with 9 bullets

(cartridges are endless, you just have to load the weapon)

(the game does not contain blood or other gore element)

 THE GAME IS STILL IN THE CONSTRUCTION PHASE! ONLY THE BETA IS AVAIBLE!
